COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba
STRING: This dream again...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8
STRING: I'd had it a lot lately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4
STRING: Or perhaps I'd been having the same dream all along
and just never noticed it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea
STRING: Like a vision that vanished in the morning light.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104
STRING: “It ends today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e
STRING: “Abandon all hope.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138
STRING: “All hope will be abandoned.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144
STRING: Then the voice repeated the words from before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e
STRING: “Remember.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: “Don't remember.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: “Forget.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4
STRING: “Don't forget.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: I tried to answer the voice, but I just couldn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6
STRING: Although I hadn't decided what to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: Although I didn't have the words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee
STRING: I wanted to give an answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc
STRING: Suddenly, I felt I had to remember.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208
STRING: Something I'd forgotten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214
STRING: Something I shouldn't have forgotten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: Amid the sensation of floating, I was pulled back to
reality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: I kept my eyes closed, listening to the sound of the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: I was about to open my eyes when I heard, right next to
me...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ce
STRING: The sound of Phorni's wings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da
STRING: Was she looking at my face as I slept, again?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: I'd get it if she did so every day, but when it only
happened after those dreams, I started to get
suspicious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: The words from the dream were still fresh in my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324
STRING: I wonder if they were Phorni's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330
STRING: Was she speaking them into my ear as I slept, causing
me to have those dreams?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: In order to find out... I slowed my breathing, and waited
to see if Phorni would start saying something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Phorni] “...Chris? You're awake, aren't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398
STRING: [Phorni] “What's up? Why are you pretending to be
asleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: [Phorni] “No, really, what's going on? I can tell you're
awake, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: ...Really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f8
STRING: Or was she trying to bait me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh, Chris, I don't know why you're pretending,
but I really can tell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: Yeah, she really could.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: She sounded like she was asking a real question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: [Chris] “...Morning. How could you tell?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bc
STRING: [Phorni] “If you look at someone sleep for three years,
you'll know. More importantly, why were you
pretending to be asleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: [Chris] “Three whole years... Someone sure has a lot of
spare time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518
STRING: [Phorni] “More or less. So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: [Chris] “I just thought I'd surprise you. I didn't think
you'd notice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: I didn't feel like talking about the dream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: I had no reason to believe that the voice was Phorni's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x566
STRING: But somehow, I knew there was some connection.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x572
STRING: And I knew that if I asked, she would definitely deny
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a4
STRING: [Phorni] “Surprise me? No way, I can tell just by the
movement of your eyelids.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c4
STRING: [Chris] “Is that so? Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: [Phorni] “Heh heh, sudden movements won't work
either, or any tricks for that matter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x616
STRING: Phorni let the matter drop and stuck out her hand as
always, indicating that she wanted to go to her favorite
spot by the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x636
STRING: [Chris] “...Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x688
STRING: [Chris] “Ready to head out?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d0
STRING: Phorni sounded very pleased from her usual spot on my
shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: Thanks to the dream, I'd gotten up early, so we had
plenty of time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fc
STRING: Every year at Natale the church got really crowded, but
every year Arie and I would head out around this time,
so we probably wouldn't have to wait in line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71c
STRING: But I'd never been there later in the day, so I didn't
know how long other people had to wait.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: [Chris] “Church first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x764
STRING: [Phorni] “Anything's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77a
STRING: Phorni answered cheerfully as I walked out into the rain
with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: The rain seemed lighter than usual today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b4
STRING: Once you got used to the city, this was nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: Phorni stayed dry, so I didn't have to worry about that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f2
STRING: [Phorni] “Not many people out and about, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: [Chris] “Not around here, but once we get to the main
street they'll be there, even at this hour.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83a
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, I see!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x850
STRING: Phorni's enthusiasm made me remember that she'd
never been outside at this time of year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x866
STRING: I had been out with Arietta both years, so it would've
been out of the question, but I felt a tiny bit of regret.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87c
STRING: [Chris] “...Let's enjoy ourselves today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e6
STRING: As expected, there were many people on the main
street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f2
STRING: Almost all the shops were closed, but as I told Phorni
earlier, most of these people were heading to the
church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92a
STRING: Today's Mass was different from those held on other
holidays, as all the church doors were opened wide so
that as many people as possible could attend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94a
STRING: The ceremony itself was quite unceremonious. Priests
didn't read from the teachings, and neither bread nor
wine was given out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: However, the sound of hymns always filled the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96e
STRING: And, perhaps this was the most troublesome thing of
all, one could line up to receive the priest's blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x984
STRING: Of course, as the church was wide open, it was possible
to go straight in and pray, but it was normal to wait, in
a line that stretched outside depending on the time of
day, for a blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a4
STRING: Of course, I'd waited in line with Arietta the past two
years and received the blessings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: But Phorni, like me, wasn't particularly serious about
religion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa10
STRING: In the first place, I wasn't sure if Phorni even had a
notion of religious faith.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa26
STRING: But this was a yearly event.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa32
STRING: It was rare for someone living in this country to not go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, it's slowly getting more crowded. Are all
these people going to the church?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, and we're two of them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa90
STRING: Phorni was having so much fun looking at all the people
crossing paths.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad8
STRING: When we got to the street that led to the New District,
the stream of people heading toward the church
became even more apparent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0a
STRING: [Phorni] “Wait, do you hear that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb20
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb36
STRING: Straining my ears, I could hear the faint sound of voices
murmuring.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4c
STRING: I knew at once that it was a hymn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb58
STRING: The hymns were an integral part of the Mass, and
hearing them so faintly, from so far away, was hardly
gratifying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8a
STRING: [Phorni] “Let's hurry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba0
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb6
STRING: As Phorni pointed ahead, she seemed ready to fly off
my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf4
STRING: Bathed in the misty rain, the white stones of the
cathedral looked even more distinct, more beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0a
STRING: Architecturally, but also as a sacred place where one
heard the voice of the divine, it was breathtaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3c
STRING: [Phorni] “Mmm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc52
STRING: Now we heard the hymns clearly, and Phorni had
started singing along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: Thankfully no one else could hear her, so I didn't mind
one bit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7e
STRING: [Chris] “Can you sing it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? Nah, I don't know the melody.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “I guess it's impossible even for you, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: [Phorni] “What nonsense, a little bit of practice and I'll
be leading the choir!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “That's more like it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd40
STRING: [Phorni] “Hold on a second...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd64
STRING: She was trying to learn the hymns from scratch, but as
soon as she picked up one melody, a different hymn
would come on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: But by the end of each song, she was singing along
almost perfectly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: There were more people in line than I'd expected, and
she kept trying for an hour or so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfc
STRING: [Phorni] “Ugh... It's too fast, and they don't repeat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe12
STRING: At last, we were about to enter the cathedral,
whereupon Phorni reluctantly stopped singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe28
STRING: [Chris] “Over a longer period, you know, there might be
some repeats.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7a
STRING: After some more waiting, we finally entered the
building.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: There was no real need for Phorni to stop singing, but,
overwhelmed by the cathedral's atmosphere perhaps,
she looked around very quietly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: [Phorni] “It's so beautiful...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee2
STRING: [Chris] “So it is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef8
STRING: I lowered my voice too, appreciating the cathedral's
interior.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: I had been here a few times before, but I still enjoyed
its beauty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf24
STRING: It wasn't excessive or gaudy, but these buildings tended
to have many ornaments and decorations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: In fact, one could say that they contributed to the aura
and mystery of a place like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: [Phorni] “We'll get a blessing, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf96
STRING: [Chris] “Of course. We'll pray for a while after that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb4
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfca
STRING: Phorni nodded eagerly, and returned her attention to
the interior's beauty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe0
STRING: As I watched her, time passed quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: Phorni was invisible to the Father, so there's no way he
could've given her a blessing, but she'd kept her eyes
closed too; perhaps God would understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: We went to the side of the line and closed our eyes in
prayer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105e
STRING: I observed Phorni for a while before closing my eyes,
and I was surprised by how serious she was about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: Her lips were moving, she seemed to be whispering
something, and her expression conveyed something
close to piety.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108a
STRING: I closed my eyes as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a8
STRING: First, I thought of Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b4
STRING: Then I thought of Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d2
STRING: I didn't know how much time had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: I opened my eyes, and saw Phorni looking at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110e
STRING: There was tenderness in that look.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111a
STRING: It reminded me of someone, I tried to remember who.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1130
STRING: At once, I realized that it was a look that Arietta often
wore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1146
STRING: A tender smile that spoke of acceptance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: I'd always thought that Phorni resembled Torta, but
perhaps she was also like Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1168
STRING: ...It was the first time I'd felt that way in the three
years we'd lived together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117e
STRING: [Chris] “...What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: [Phorni] “Just looking at your face, Chris. Did you
re-examine yourself and your life?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b2
STRING: [Chris] “...More or less. What about you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e4
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm a fairy, these things don't really matter to
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fa
STRING: Phorni feigned nonchalance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: I could tell it was a lie, from the way she was praying
just now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121c
STRING: But I pretended to believe her, and we went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124c
STRING: Outside, I realized that some time had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1258
STRING: The line had gotten even longer, one probably had to
wait over an hour to get inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128a
STRING: [Phorni] “Everyone has such strong faith...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a0
STRING: [Chris] “Just for today, probably? Like us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d2
STRING: [Phorni] “That's true. Anyway, what's next?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Another famous spot in this city is the
concert hall, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1324
STRING: [Phorni] “Excuse me, we're not here for sightseeing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: [Chris] “But you've never been, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: [Chris] “You don't want to go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b4
STRING: [Phorni] “...I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ca
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. Then let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1412
STRING: Unlike the church, the concert hall was not decorated
grandly at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1428
STRING: However, it did boast a certain functional beauty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: The building, designed with straight lines for
practicality, was still beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144a
STRING: I wondered if there'd be a concert later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: A sizable crowd had gathered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147e
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow... It's huge.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: [Chris] “It's one of the bigger halls in the country. I hear
the equipment and facilities are also top-notch, perhaps
the best in the country.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14da
STRING: [Phorni] “It's the city of music, that's for sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f0
STRING: [Chris] “It'd be nice to attend a performance... But I'll
bet they aren't selling tickets any more...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1510
STRING: For smaller concerts, they'd sell tickets near the
entrance on the day, but I didn't see any.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1526
STRING: It was Natale, and people in line looked very
well-dressed, so it was probably a fancy concert by
some renowned musician.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm okay. If I wanted music, I'd just go back
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1582
STRING: [Chris] “Surely you're not comparing this to my Fortelle
playing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: [Phorni] “...And the singing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: [Chris] “Your voice is far better, clearly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fc
STRING: [Phorni] “Flatterer. But I do think that your Fortelle
playing is up to that level, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161c
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Who's the flatterer now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164e
STRING: [Phorni] “You just can't take an honest compliment...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1664
STRING: [Chris] “It's strange, but when I'm performing an
ensemble with you, Phorni, I feel like one of these fancy
musicians.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Here we go again...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Chris] “When we get back, let's do an ensemble.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e8
STRING: [Phorni] “Only until your new partner shows up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: For a while, we looked at the building and the people
going inside. Then we talked about what to do next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1732
STRING: [Phorni] “Time to go home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1748
STRING: [Chris] “I guess. We didn't see much, but it can't be
helped, all the shops are closed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: [Phorni] “We saw plenty. I had a really fun time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry for not taking you out much before
this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Ha-ha, don't look so serious when you say
things like that, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d8
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry... Would be the wrong thing to say, I
guess?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f6
STRING: [Phorni] “...Clever boy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180c
STRING: [Chris] “Well then, let's go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x185a
STRING: [Phorni] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a2
STRING: On the way home, I saw an unfamiliar food stall in a
corner of the piazza.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: Perhaps it was because I hardly ever went to the piazza,
but for some reason this stall caught my eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: Come to think of it, I'd skipped breakfast as always, and
the thought of food quickly reminded me that I was
starving.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190a
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you looking at? ...Ah, the sign says
'Calzones'.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh right, you must be hungry, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1972
STRING: [Chris] “I could eat. But I'll just make something at
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Why? You could just eat here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c4
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I'd be eating by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f6
STRING: [Phorni] “I'll watch you eat, that's what I do at home
anyway. And, the time saved by not cooking can be
spent on ensembles.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a20
STRING: [Chris] “...That's true. Okay, maybe I'll get something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3e
STRING: [Phorni] “Go for it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a54
STRING: Phorni urged me on, she was enjoying this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a60
STRING: Giving in, I walked over to the stall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a78
STRING: As I got nearer, I saw that it was actually quite busy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8e
STRING: I guess it had all the customers to itself, since
everything else was closed for Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa4
STRING: As long as you were willing to work on Natale, business
was sure to be good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aba
STRING: I reached the stall, above which was a sign with
“Marco's Calzones” in big letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad0
STRING: Marco was probably the name of the kind-looking old
man who was baking the calzones inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae6
STRING: [Marco] “Hi there, welcome!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1afc
STRING: The old man's voice was as friendly as he looked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b08
STRING: [Chris] “Er, hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1e
STRING: [Marco] “As the sign says, we've got nothing but
calzones here. Just one? Or does a young man like you
need two?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b48
STRING: [Chris] “...There's no way I could eat two. I'll take one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5e
STRING: [Marco] “Ha ha ha, they are filling, so I guess one'll do
for a slim lad like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7e
STRING: He didn't say it in a mean way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8a
STRING: Nor was there any malice in the hearty laugh that
followed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba0
STRING: [Marco] “Here, this one just came out of the oven.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb6
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bcc
STRING: I paid the old man, and received one freshly baked
calzone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd8
STRING: It had some weight to it, and looked very filling, like the
old man said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0a
STRING: [Phorni] “What did he mean by slim... Despite how you
look, you're still a boy, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2a
STRING: [Chris] “‘Despite how you look’ is much more insulting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c54
STRING: Phorni didn't hear me, and continued looking at the old
man.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c72
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, what's that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c88
STRING: Phorni was pointing at... It was near the old man's feet,
and looked like a musical instrument.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c9e
STRING: [Chris] “That's an accordion... I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd0
STRING: [Phorni] “What's it for?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce6
STRING: [Chris] “Performances, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d04
STRING: [Phorni] “But, here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d1a
STRING: [Chris] “I doubt it. Well, let's ask him after I eat this. I'm
starving.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d56
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, right, my bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d98
STRING: I sat on the edge of the fountain and unwrapped my
lunch.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da4
STRING: Mixed with the smell of baked bread, the aroma of
meat and herbs whetted my appetite.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry Phorni, this won't take long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dec
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't worry, eat more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e02
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e18
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e44
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e5a
STRING: [Chris] “It's kinda hard to eat with you looking at me like
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8c
STRING: [Phorni] “What, should I be staring at the sky, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea2
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not saying that... Just look somewhere else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eca
STRING: [Phorni] “No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee0
STRING: [Chris] “...Fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0a
STRING: Without much thought, I took a bite of the calzone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f16
STRING: [Chris] “...This is delicious...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2c
STRING: It wasn't something I'd tasted much of before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f38
STRING: I'd heard of the name, it was a well-known dish, but this
was my first time eating one and I smacked my lips
without realizing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f62
STRING: [Chris] “...I could have more of this...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f78
STRING: Somehow I stopped worrying about Phorni, and then
suddenly, one calzone became none.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f96
STRING: [Phorni] “Was it yummy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fac
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I don't think I could eat two in one go,
but I'd like to have another one some time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe8
STRING: [Phorni] “Great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ffe
STRING: [Chris] “...Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201c
STRING: [Phorni] “You looked like you really enjoyed it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2032
STRING: [Chris] “Somehow, I think you're missing the point, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: [Phorni] “But Chris, you never look like you're enjoying
your food when you eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2084
STRING: [Chris] “Really? I think I eat just like anyone else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b6
STRING: [Phorni] “It's like you're eating just to get nutrition. You
cook by yourself, eat it quietly, and that's it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e0
STRING: [Chris] “...That sounds about right. But I can't get that
excited when I'm eating by myself, can I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2126
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm always around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213c
STRING: [Chris] “...Well, that's another story...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x215a
STRING: [Phorni] “If only you enjoyed your food all the time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2170
STRING: [Chris] “...I'll try.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a2
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't be dense. It's not about trying. It's like a
smile that comes without you realizing... What
happened earlier, that happened naturally.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21cc
STRING: [Chris] “Well then, it's impossible, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ea
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm saying, it's about your state of mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2200
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay. I'll enjoy my food more from now
on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: [Phorni] “You silly-”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2248
STRING: [Chris] “That was a joke! Look, we should get going. I'm
full, and we want to ask about the accordion, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2284
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22cc
STRING: I returned Phorni to my shoulder, and walked back to
the stall to throw away the wrapping paper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e2
STRING: Phorni and I must've spent some time talking, it wasn't
as crowded as before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f8
STRING: [Chris] “That was really delicious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230e
STRING: [Marco] “You thought so? Great, come back any time
for another.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232e
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... If I'm free, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2344
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x235a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm graduating soon, so I don't know if I'll be
able to come again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2370
STRING: [Marco] “Graduating? Don't tell me, you're a student at
Piova?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2386
STRING: [Chris] “Eh? Uh, yeah, I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x239c
STRING: [Marco] “Why didn't you say so? I would've given you a
discount.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23bc
STRING: [Chris] “I... I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d2
STRING: [Marco] “Well, now the slim figure makes sense. What
do you play, the piano?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f2
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2408
STRING: [Marco] “Whoa! You play the Fortelle, now that's
something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241e
STRING: [Chris] “Nah... It's nothing, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2434
STRING: [Marco] “Humility's a good trait to have, kid. I like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: [Phorni] “Psst, I think he likes you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a0
STRING: [Marco] “How about it, interested in hearing this old
accordion here? It's a store specialty. No Fortelle here,
sadly, but you can sing, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ca
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I can sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e0
STRING: [Marco] “You have some time to spare?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f6
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2528
STRING: [Phorni] “I'll sing too!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254c
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2562
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... In that case, just for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2578
STRING: [Marco] “Oh! Really? People keep saying no, but you,
kid, you're a good person.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2598
STRING: [Chris] “People kept saying no to you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ae
STRING: [Marco] “Well, it's still one of our specialties.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c4
STRING: [Chris] “But what about the stall?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25da
STRING: [Marco] “At this time, I'm always playing the accordion.
My customers know it, so they won't come by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2604
STRING: ...They probably wouldn't come by even if they didn't
know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2610
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2626
STRING: [Marco] “Great! Let's get this show on the road.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2658
STRING: [Phorni] “Whee!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a6
STRING: The old man picked up the accordion and began
playing right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26bc
STRING: Specialty or not, he definitely had some skill.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c8
STRING: He may not have been a professional, but his sound
came from the heart, and filled his listeners with sheer
enjoyment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26de
STRING: Phorni was singing along, she seemed to really enjoy it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f4
STRING: As for me, I'd learned how to sing in class but it wasn't
my specialty, so I couldn't sing all that well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270a
STRING: But we were in sync, somehow, and I was able to
simply enjoy the sounds, leaving technique et cetera
behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272a
STRING: People crossing the piazza didn't give us strange looks,
in fact some sang along as they walked by, others even
stopped and joined in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275c
STRING: I wonder how long we stayed there that day...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2768
STRING: Visibly tired, the old man put down the accordion and
caught his breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a0
STRING: [Marco] “Phew... That was tiring...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b6
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e8
STRING: [Phorni] “I can still go on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x280c
STRING: [Marco] “It's been a while since I really played, and for
this long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2822
STRING: All the singing passers-by had left, and it was strangely
quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2838
STRING: [Marco] “Normally, I'd stay open for a while longer, but
I'm done for today. That's what happens when you get
older.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2862
STRING: [Chris] “Nuh uh, I'm pretty tired too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2878
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha, you sang plenty. You got pretty good in
a short time, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2898
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ae
STRING: [Marco] “But... Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28c4
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28da
STRING: [Marco] “The girl who sang along right to the end...
Such a beautiful voice... I guess she left?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28fa
STRING: [Chris] “A girl...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292c
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2942
STRING: [Marco] “She sounded like an angel... Had to be a Piova
student, or a pro who happened to walk by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2962
STRING: [Chris] “...You heard such a voice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2978
STRING: [Marco] “Yeah, from the start. That's why I thought she
might still be around... I was going to offer her a
calzone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a2
STRING: [Chris] “Did he really hear her voice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29b8
STRING: [Marco] “Huh? You didn't hear it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ce
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, no. I mean, it's not that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a00
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, is he talking about me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a16
STRING: I nodded, and my earlier thoughts rushed back to me all
at once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a2c
STRING: Perhaps I'd been right all along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a38
STRING: [Marco] “Well, too bad if she's not around. Here, take
these.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a58
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6e
STRING: The old man put the leftover calzones in a bag and
gave it to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a84
STRING: [Marco] “It's a token of thanks, for spending quality time
with me. Come back whenever you want.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa4
STRING: [Chris] “If I have the chance, definitely.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aba
STRING: [Marco] “Great. I'll be waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ad0
STRING: I left the piazza with Phorni, who'd been very
uncomfortable this whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae6
STRING: She was making that face because it was the first time
someone else had heard her voice, probably.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2afc
STRING: Anyway, we'd talk about it at home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b08
STRING: This was probably a good opportunity to bring up my
idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b14
STRING: [Chris] “...Let's go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b32
STRING: [Phorni] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bbc
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be0
STRING: I said my greeting to an empty room, and went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bec
STRING: Phorni was always in, so it'd become a habit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c02
STRING: I dried myself with a towel that Phorni had laid out
before we left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c18
STRING: [Chris] “He was definitely talking about you, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4a
STRING: [Phorni] “...Probably.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c60
STRING: [Chris] “Is this the first time someone else has heard
you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c80
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c96
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc8
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh... Yeah, probably.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cde
STRING: [Chris] “Don't you think that's great?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d10
STRING: [Phorni] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d26
STRING: [Chris] “If other people can hear you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d44
STRING: [Phorni] “Then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d5a
STRING: [Chris] “Then、 even after I leave, you won't have to be
alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d96
STRING: [Phorni] “That... Doesn't really mean anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dac
STRING: [Chris] “Then, will you come with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dde
STRING: [Phorni] “That won't be possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2df4
STRING: [Chris] “Why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e12
STRING: [Phorni] “...It just isn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e28
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't asked you for the reason yet, have I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e46
STRING: [Phorni] “I can't tell you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e5c
STRING: [Chris] “Is it because you don't want to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e7a
STRING: [Phorni] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e90
STRING: [Chris] “Then we'll just have to find some other way.
Making it possible for other people to hear you, for
example.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eb8
STRING: [Phorni] “...Yes, maybe.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ece
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni? Why are you making that face? If so,
why won't you come with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0a
STRING: [Phorni] “...I'm sorry, you really are serious about this, I
see. Then it's better for people to hear me, probably.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f2a
STRING: [Chris] “I think it's best if you came with me, Phorni. But
if that's impossible... That's the next best option.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f5c
STRING: [Phorni] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f72
STRING: [Chris] “Are you convinced?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f90
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, I think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa6
STRING: [Chris] “Good, I hope so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fd8
STRING: [Phorni] “So, what now? An ensemble is probably out of
the question. You seem tired from singing all those new
songs.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3002
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah, I'm really tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3020
STRING: [Phorni] “Your singing got a lot better, by the way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3040
STRING: [Chris] “That's because there was a girl who sang with
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3072
STRING: [Phorni] “Hehe. It'd be nice to go back there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3088
STRING: [Chris] “If you want to, Phorni, let's go again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30ba
STRING: [Phorni] “Thanks. Now we just have to wait for your
partner. Are you gonna practice today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30da
STRING: [Chris] “...If she feels like it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310c
STRING: [Phorni] “Did she have something to do today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3122
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm... You could say that, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3154
STRING: [Phorni] “...How vague. You did set a meeting time,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3174
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a6
STRING: [Phorni] “What?! So you don't even know when she's
coming?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31bc
STRING: [Chris] “...Nope.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31ee
STRING: [Phorni] “What the... And that's okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3204
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... The truth is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x321a
STRING: Secretly, I put my idea into action.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3226
STRING: Phorni was going to be so mad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3232
STRING: But that was the only thing I could do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x323e
STRING: No other path seemed conceivable to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324a
STRING: [Chris] “...Here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x326e
STRING: I took out a small hand mirror from the desk, and held it
in front of Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x327a
STRING: So that she could see herself in it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a2
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32b8
STRING: [Chris] “I said 'Here'.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32d6
STRING: [Phorni] “What's with the mirror?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ec
STRING: [Chris] “My partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330a
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3320
STRING: [Chris] “The mirror shows who my partner is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3336
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x334c
STRING: For a while, Phorni looked down in thought and cocked
her head to the side several times, whereupon she
looked like she finally knew what to say to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3388
STRING: [Phorni] “...Hold on a second. What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x339e
STRING: [Chris] “Exactly what I said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33d0
STRING: [Phorni] “This is a joke, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e6
STRING: [Chris] “I'm dead serious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3418
STRING: [Phorni] “Why would you do something so stupid?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342e
STRING: [Chris] “I know it's stupid. But I thought about it a lot,
and this was the only way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346a
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you saying! You won't be able to
graduate, you realize!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348a
STRING: [Chris] “You heard what the old man said, right? Other
people might be able to hear your voice too, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34b2
STRING: [Phorni] “You think they'd accept that for your recital?
Even if they did hear me, they'd just think their ears
were playing tricks!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34d2
STRING: [Chris] “That's fine. If your voice could be heard by
everyone, then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34fa
STRING: [Phorni] “Stop saying stupid things!, You have to find a
partner, fast!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x351a
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni, I'm absolutely serious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x354c
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you fine with not graduating?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3562
STRING: [Chris] “If it's not possible, so be it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3580
STRING: [Phorni] “What about Arie? Are you going to make her
wait another year?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3596
STRING: [Chris] “I'll quit school and go back home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c8
STRING: [Phorni] “Then why the heck did you come here in the
first place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35de
STRING: [Chris] “To figure out my future. Of course, at first I'd
dreamed of becoming a musician. But then I realized
that I wasn't really cut out to be one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3624
STRING: [Phorni] “Even though you're such a great Fortelle
player?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x363a
STRING: [Chris] “It's not enough. To be a professional player...
You've got to know how to handle people, and you
have to always want to get better.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366c
STRING: [Phorni] “Didn't you come here, Chris, because you
wanted to get better?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368c
STRING: [Chris] “But I just couldn't get used to things at the
school. I liked music, that's all, plain and simple.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36ac
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c2
STRING: [Chris] “But... That's not the real reason, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36d8
STRING: At first, Phorni was shouting angrily, but she'd lowered
her voice bit by bit, and now she was almost silent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36ee
STRING: But, I went on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36fa
STRING: [Chris] “I want to do this for your sake, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x372c
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't use my name if you're just running away.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3742
STRING: [Chris] “Running away? From what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3760
STRING: [Phorni] “From reality, duh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3776
STRING: There was vitriol in Phorni's voice, it wasn't like her at
all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3782
STRING: I felt as if I was speaking to someone else entirely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37aa
STRING: [Phorni] “You should've paired up with Torta, Chris. I
always thought that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37ca
STRING: [Chris] “That's for me to decide.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e8
STRING: [Phorni] “No, you can't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37fe
STRING: [Chris] “Why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x381c
STRING: [Phorni] “I... It's... It's impossible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3832
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni? What's impossible?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3850
STRING: [Phorni] “...Chris. Listen up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3866
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3884
STRING: [Phorni] “It's still not too late, so go ask Torta. Until you
do, you won't see me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a4
STRING: [Chris] “Wait, what?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Until you ask her, I absolutely will not show
myself. That's a promise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38ec
STRING: [Chris] “I never made any promise like that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390a
STRING: [Phorni] “Then I'll forgive you. Bring Torta here, fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x392a
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3948
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398a
STRING: Then Phorni was gone, just as she said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39a0
STRING: The most amazing day ended on the worst possible
note.
